briefTitle: Safety and Immunogenicity of 20vPnC Coadministered With SIIV in Adults ≥65 Years of Age
officialTitle: A PHASE 3, RANDOMIZED, DOUBLE-BLIND TRIAL TO EVALUATE THE SAFETY AND IMMUNOGENICITY OF A 20-VALENT PNEUMOCOCCAL CONJUGATE VACCINE (20VPNC) WHEN COADMINISTERED WITH SEASONAL INACTIVATED INFLUENZA VACCINE (SIIV) IN ADULTS ≥65 YEARS OF AGE
summary: Study of the safety and immunogenicity of 20vPnC and influenza vaccine administered at the same visit or separately

primaryOutcome.measure: Percentage of Participants With Local Reactions Within 10 Days After Vaccination With 20vPnC
primaryOutcome.timeFrame: Within 10 days after Vaccination 1 for Coadministration group and within 10 days after Vaccination 2 for Separate Administration group
